article.bdy:
Atrosanguineus Spiritus is a tincture used for spiritual purposes. Its name is Latin based, atrosanguineus meaning "Dark Blood Red" and spiritus meaning "Breath". It is made with marijuana, salvia divinorum, Hallucinogenic mushrooms and its most abundant ingredient, St. Johns Wort. It is soaked in olive oil for a week and then heated over a low heat. It is then drained and ready for consumption. It gets its dark red color from the St. Johns Wort.
Effects
Atrosanguineus Spiritus has different effects for different people. Hallucinations and visions are common. Others say it feels like eating marijuana products.
